reviewText: The only release of this DVD as of 2017 is English or German your choice.  Plays perfectly on USA players regardless of what the ads say. Tells the seldom treated story of the extinction of Homo Erectus at the hands of Homo Sapiens in Asia about 75,000 years ago. Live action and interviews. ca 45 minutes. Moderately interesting account of how the two species looked and how they may have interacted.
